data.name: Jumpin' Jazz Cats
data.detailed_description:
Master cat parkour:

Grind down handrails, Swing from chandeliers, Bounce off cushions, perform acrobatic jumps, cling to paintings, powerslide across slippery varnished floors, scratch the couch, climb the curtains, hitch a ride on the back of another cat, ride the resident dog like a bull and even drive a robo vacuum!


Explore the Ellington estate:

When you and your feline friends enter the famed Ellington Manor, most of the doors will be locked - like all cats it'll drive you crazy with curiosity to know what's behind each door! Catch enough elusive golden bugs to unlock and reveal all of the rooms (mini games). The path won't be easy as it's littered with yappy dogs, noisy vacuum cleaners, terrifying toasters and the endless lure of cat toys and laser lights!


Cats are sweet, cats are jerks

You'll discover a unique collection of competitive and cooperative mini games: One of our game type regularly alternates between earning points by being sweet (be nice and nuzzle each other) and jerk modes (slap your friends and destroy all the furniture). In our “King of the hill” variations, hold (and drive) the Robo vacuum for the longest time to win. In a series of racing challenges, be the first to the dinner plate, catch the mouse or eat all the fish! Join the kitty cat jazz band to play simultaneous musical rhythm games in fantasy levels of giant jazz instruments.


OK cool cats, time to customize!

Collect, earn and play with a host of cats while unlocking special furniture, interactables and color schemes to setup your home lounge just how you like. Personalize your cat in a mini game where players can change colors, patterns, breeds and add props to their unique kitten! Once perfected, jump into the little painting studio and use those honed platforming skills to leave paws of paint on giant canvases (your artwork will be saved and randomly featured in level backgrounds!).




Jumpin' Jazz Cats is being created by solo developer Dan Harris with his close friend Arun Sol composing a toe tappin' jazz soundtrack. Please support us with a wishlist and follow the development on Twitter or TikTok!

data.short_description: Play, race and hang with your feline friends in this platformer party game! Purrfect your pussycat parkour as you sprint, jump, bounce, swing, skid and slide while exploring a jazzy cartoon mansion filled with devious distractions; these curious kitties will have to stay focused… staaaaaaay focused!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
